title: Green apple salad with blueberries, feta and walnuts
ingredients: ['220g mixed salad leaves', '1 large Granny Smith apples, cubed', '60g chopped walnuts', '75g crumbled feta cheese', '60g dried cranberries', '2 tablespoons finely chopped spring onions (optional)', 'Dressing', '60ml vegetable oil', '35g blueberries', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
